threads.text: This phone, so far, has been better than anticipated. The camera is really good...something HTC is not normally that strong at.  The battery, even though it is only 2600 milliamps is very efficient thanks to the Snapdragon 630 processor.  The phones is beautiful, but the back cover will get scratched just by breathing on it, but that is what covers are for, right?  Good size, good enough memory, pretty phone, good battery life, good camera, and just $300 bucks.

I love this phone so far! It's fast ergonomically pleasing. I like to use a back up phone for music for walks and driving. The phone I had before that was a Samsung j7 which was craptastic. I love the software experience it really is close to stock feeling with themed icons. I am using pixel 2 as my DD and if it weren't for the underwhelming camera I could definitely use this as my DD
If battery is user removable, it's 100%
Great in low light especially selfies
gcam mod improves the lowlight auto hdr performance significant. but its out of the box a surprisingly good camera.

Hello again, I use now for selfies, the Oneplus Camera. Although it only makes pictures in 4.1 MP but those are the best that I can do right now. If I find an improvement or even maybe a solution, I'll contact you here.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/102s...w?usp=drivesdk

title: Time to take picture (camera launch speed)

threads.text: So I know this is probably atypical, but as I've been on my phone a lot today, I thought I'd check my SoT when I hit 15% battery. I'm coming from an old Nexus 5, so I'm probably more easily impressed, but my phone has been on battery for ~12 hours with an estimated 2 hours of life left and a whopping ~6 hours 24 minutes of SoT. This is a heavy usage day for me, and if this is my battery expectation on a heavy day, I will never have a SoT issue with this phone.

replies.text:
Me too come from Nexus 5 and can only agree. I was a little concerned about the smallish battery, but it looks like it will be enough for my usage.

Right now i have:
last full charge 14h 3m
screen usage since full charge 4h 17m
and i have 53% battery left
